title: Trump claims Boris Johnson asked him to arrange surprise meeting between Harry Dunn's parents and woman accused over his death
text:
Donald Trump has claimed that Boris Johnson asked him to engineer a meeting between Harry Dunn’s parents and Anne Sacoolas.

Ms Sacoolas is suspected of causing the 19-year-old’s death.

“My meeting with the family was really..beautiful,” the US president said.

“The meeting took place...at about six o’clock last night.

“They lost their son. I believe it was going down the wrong way. It’s very tough. The roads are opposite – she said that’s what happened.

“[Ms Sacoolas] was in the room right out there. We met right here.

“I offered to bring the person in question in and they weren’t ready for it. But I did offer.”

“I spoke with Boris, he asked me if I’d do that and I did it,” he said.

“They wanted to meet with her and unfortunately when we had everybody together they decided not to meet.”

The Independent has approached Downing Street for comment.

More follows…
